title: AG Gradnja – Construction Company Website
paragraph: AG Gradnja is a modern, high-performance website developed for a construction company, focused on showcasing services, completed projects, and building trust with potential clients. The website emphasizes clean design, clarity, and reliability, reflecting the company’s professionalism in the construction industry.
paragraph2: This project demonstrates my ability to build scalable, multilingual, and SEO-optimized business websites. The site includes a fully responsive layout, multi-language support (SR, EN, DE, TR, AR), optimized images, fast loading performance, and a clear service and project presentation structure. Built with modern frontend technologies and best practices for real-world production use.

title: AI Landing Page GPT-3 Inspired Design
paragraph: This is a static presentation website inspired by modern AI landing page designs, built as part of my portfolio. The page is designed to showcase the potential and possibilities of GPT-3 technology and artificial intelligence in general.
paragraph2: To demonstrate my skills in frontend development, content structure, and modern UI/UX design, inspired by real-world SaaS landing pages. Technologies Used: HTML5 / CSS3 React Fully responsive design optimized for different devices

title: Crypto Landing Page Web3 & Blockchain Design
paragraph: A modern static landing page focused on the world of cryptocurrencies and Web3. The site allows users to explore crypto markets, connect their wallets, and simulate sending transactions across the world.
paragraph2: The project demonstrates my ability to build Web3-inspired UI with a strong focus on security, usability, and modern frontend practices. Sections include reliability, security, fast transactions, and exchange rates. Technologies Used: HTML5 / CSS3 React Responsive design Wallet connect simulation.

title: Restaurant Landing Page Modern Food & Dining Design
paragraph: A clean and modern restaurant landing page designed to showcase menus, dining experience, and online reservations. The site provides an elegant introduction to the restaurant with a strong focus on user-friendly navigation and appealing food presentation.
paragraph2: The project demonstrates my ability to design and develop a modern restaurant landing page with clear sections such as menu highlights, services, customer testimonials, and a reservation call-to-action. Technologies Used: HTML5 / CSS3, React, TailwindCSS, fully responsive design optimized for all devices.

title: Fintech Landing Page Modern Payment Solutions
paragraph: A modern and professional landing page built for a fintech product that showcases digital payment solutions, secure transactions, and financial management features. The design highlights key benefits such as rewards, balance transfers, billing control, and customer testimonials.
paragraph2: This project demonstrates my ability to design and develop fintech-oriented user interfaces with a focus on trust, usability, and responsive design. The page includes sections for product features, customer statistics, billing & invoicing, client testimonials, and partner logos. Technologies Used: HTML5 / CSS3, React, TailwindCSS, fully responsive layout optimized for all devices.

title: Ecommerce Shop Vite + React
paragraph: A modern ecommerce web application built with Vite and React, designed to provide users with a smooth and responsive online shopping experience. The platform includes product listings, shopping cart functionality, and a clean UI that emphasizes usability and performance.
paragraph2: This project demonstrates my skills in building scalable ecommerce solutions with modern frontend technologies. Key features include dynamic product catalog, add-to-cart system, checkout flow, and responsive design optimized for all devices. Technologies Used: React, Vite, TailwindCSS, and JavaScript for a fast, modular, and efficient development workflow.
